description: Limits the data cube to contain only data whose attributes match against the specified expression. The attribute to match against is specified with the parameter `name`. See the *Collection Discovery* for available attributes.

name.description: Name of the attribute to filter on.

expression.description: Expression to evaluate against the attribute values.

x.description: A value of any data type could be passed.

returns.description: A data cube with values restricted by a filter on its value's metadata attributes. Therefore, the cardinality is potentially lower, but the resolution and the number of dimensions are the same as for the original data cube.
